text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ActCoverageLimitCode

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ActCoverageLimitCodeActCoverageLimitCodeCriteria that are applicable to the authorized coverage.

name: ActCoverageLimitCode
title: ActCoverageLimitCode
description: Criteria that are applicable to the authorized coverage.
